main event: A UFO observation report from Fayetteville, North Carolina, describing a round object the size of a dull yellow balloon observed for 10-15 seconds.
interesting points: The observer did not see the object take off or land., The object was approximately the size of a dull yellow balloon., There was mention of a slight swishing sound associated with the object., The report was part of Project Blue Book by the U.S. Air Force., The observer estimated the distance to the object at about 200 feet.
sighted object: a round object the size of a dull yellow balloon
witness description: A 19-year-old male with an interest in unidentified flying objects.
